subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Nebraska quarterback Sam Keller is a gambler.  His biggest gamble -- transferring from A.S.U. to Nebraska for his senior year -- has paid off as teh Huskers are 2-0 with No. 1 Southern California visiting Lincoln on Saturday.
